contents:
four score and four years ago in Hamburg, our Führer Hitler made his lone campaign speech before the referendum, explaining that he arranged for the abolition of the presidency in order to prevent any attempts by foreign elements to stir up intrigues over the question of succession. Besides he clarified that “all 17th August are created of the Toad，by the Toad，for the Toad，never perish on the harte. ”

用维基百科1934年8月17日条目乱膜改的
